rooms.name: kitchen

rooms.name: bedroom_2

rooms.name: bedroom_3

rooms.name: bathroom
rooms.description: Shared bathroom conveniently located near the bedrooms. Simple design and fixtures to maintain budget constraints while ensuring functionality.

rooms.name: library
rooms.description: A designated library space with floor-to-ceiling shelves and ample seating area; designed for quiet reading and study.
